remarks: Define the class of all Hausdorff spaces.  A Hausdorff space is a topology in which distinct points have disjoint open neighborhoods. Definition of Hausdorff space in [Munkres] p. 98.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)
statement:
df-haus $p |- Haus = { j e. Top | A. x e. U. j A. y e. U. j ( x =/= y -> E. n e. j E. m e. j ( x e. n /\ y e. m /\ ( n i^i m ) = (/) ) ) } $.
$d j m n x y $.
